name: Five nights at emery's 2
description:
-FIVE NIGHTS AT EMERY'S 2-          -=THE BEGIN OF 1987=-

=============================================================

INFORMATION:

This game is a fnaf fan-game,this has flashing lights loud noise and lots of jumpscares also this is rated Teens, If you don't wanna Saw/hear this scary game you may click off right now if you are younger age and if you are brave for this and fnaf fan please Enjoy! also Real fnaf was created by scott cowthon

============================================================

STORY:

Blueys Diner (1980) was shut down and turned Scraped there are a murder in this place

The Police can't Find Bluey and Reddy they been scerching every where in the building They found rest animatronics and they send to the factory After 7 years here apply for job The night gaurd will watch the factory after 6 AM And do task in floor 3 it will be worst and worst and worst Can you beat this full 5 nights?

============================================================

machanics and controlls:

Broken Emery:he's going to your office use shock

Broken Ben:If he's Near Your Office Use were a mask to go Away

Broken Noelle: If She's Near Your Office Use were a mask to go Away

Broken Josh:in night 2 josh will be in your office, when he's at 3rd stage Flash light at him

Broken Dan:He can broke the power and jumpscare (Cam 7) Use Shock to stop him

Broken Susie:She's In Vents Use Seal Vent (Toggle Vent)

Terry: when the screen pops up click X to Closed (camera)

(TIP: Terry won't be in custom Mode)

T.P.T coming soon...

Press space to Flash light 

============================================================

VIDEOS:

More coming soon!
